Sutherland is lighting up today with solid 6 ft @10s W swell and a light 10 mph S wind. Best spots include Strathy and Sango Bay, both offering clean conditions during their respective tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 4 ft @15s WNW with a moderate 11 mph E wind, still providing fun waves at Melvich and Strathy. By the day after, expect 5 ft @12s W with similar E winds, keeping the surf lively at the same spots. Best: today.
